name: Seasons Greetings from VRTK
description:
Virtual Reality Festive Fun.

Requires SteamVR compatible headset or Oculus Rift through Oculus Home.

A season's greetings from VRTK with a mini showcase of some of the VRTK features whilst having fun in a winter cabin.

There are a bunch of Easter eggs to find in the game, the controls are simple enough to figure out so have fun!

Features

  • Open your presents
  • Decorate the tree
  • Eat some snacks
  • Build a snowman
  • Look out for santa
  • Fight the hordes
